Jemele represents everything I HATE with the recent mass hysteria placed on some blacks. 

Black people, YOU ARE NOT VICTIMS JUST BECAUSE YOU'RE BLACK. I have yet to see one statistic, one actual  fact that proves blacks are oppressed. 

There are no laws that are victimizing black people, and no, police brutality is not exclusive to blacks.

The police kill less than 1000 people in a nation of 350 million per year. Most of those people are white and most of the shootings(99%) are justified. Blacks may be targeted at a slightly higher rate, but when you put into account the rate blacks commit crimes, they're actually targeted at a lower rate than white people. This among many other things shows that there is no reasonable cause for BLM or for people to act as if the country is racist. Please, give me a fact that proves racism, not an isolated instance or some videos.

I agree that one unjustified shooting is too much, but the reality is that there will always be bad police. 

And lastly, Jemele is a stupid, small, overweight, insecure black person who needs to stop. I am a South America Immigrant, and I support Trump 100% with this. He is a target because he is White. People hate to see a white "privileged" male that will call you out and not be silent.
